author: eptwts
text:
i don't understand how incompetent you have to be to glorify X payouts...

if an account of my size which is getting millions of impressions per month is only netting $1k/month from this then i promise it's not that lucrative

in this niche, you can make 50x-100x of what you make from X payouts as long as you are sending traffic to a solid offer
